The Union or Amalgamation of the Vikar States.

The Vikar Islands make up a continent whose origin is the former Island of Iceland. 

Subregions of the VNA:

Honzik Coast:
Include [nation]Norscandager[/nation], [nation]Ghetjarland[/nation], and [nation]Ajtac[/nation].

Nord Islands:
Include [nation]Euroistan[/nation] and [nation]Razem[/nation]

The Official Currency of the Amalgamation is the Vikar [b]Crooss[/b] (*Not all countries use the crooss).
